definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: hollow of hand (NH [[חוֹפֶן]], Aram. [[חָפְנִי]], [[חוּפְנׇא]], h.uwpno0; Eth. h.fn:—also Ar. h.ufnah;un hollow in the ground; and, acc, to Zehnpfund:BAB i, 635, As. ḫupunnu, bowl, but ḫ = h.?)—only du. [[חָפְנַיִם]] Ec 4:6; cstr. [[חָפְנֵי]] Ez Eze 10:7 (del. Co intern. grounds); sf. [[חָפְנֶיךָ]] Ez Eze 10:2; [[חָפְנׇיו]] Le 16:2, Pr 30:4; [[חָפְנֵינֶם]] Ex 9:8; ´[[מַלֵּא ה]] Ez Eze 10:2 + v:Eze 10:7 (del. Co cf. supr.);—´[[מְלאׁ ח]] = handful Ex 9:8, Le 16:12 (both P), Ec 4:6, material follows in implic. acc.; ´[[מי־אסךָ רוח בח]] Pr 30:4.
